name: Venus Eleven Vivid!
summary:
The pinnacle of beautiful girls × soccer × simulation!
This isn’t just a typical beautiful girl game, it’s seriously about soccer!

This is a 2D Japanese gacha sports simulation game where you manage a soccer team of girls from diverse backgrounds and worlds by improving their skills. Each of them is competent in specific positions, some can only be goalkeeper, attacker, defender, midfielder and some can have multiple positions. The manager will have to choose the formation of his team. Also some girls have special skill allowing them to counter the ball or opposing players. During breaks, the manager can treat his players when they are exhausted or switch places to those who are not playing on the field. The soccer gameplay is focused on the choice of action to be carried out for the player currently having the ball or being close to the opposing player having it. There are visual novel like stories about World Cup and personal characters stories. Each character is voiced to.
